name: CSS Anchor Positioning
description: Allows placing elements anywhere on the page relative to an "anchor element", without regard to the layout of other elements besides their containing block

byNum.1: Can be enabled via the `#enable-experimental-web-platform-features` flag in `chrome://flags`
byNum.2: Can be enabled using the `layout.css.anchor-positioning.enabled` flag. Enabled by default in Firefox Nightly only
